it.escape.core.server.model

Class AnnouncerStrings

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.escape.core.server.model.AnnouncerStrings
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Announcer

    public class AnnouncerStrings
extends java.util.Observable
implements Announcer
    AnnouncerStrings class: simple observable, relays a message to the observers; those are located in the server view (our net-communication threads). Each running game will instance only one announcer
    Author:
    michele
